      Creates a user by adding information from an DBUser object to the database.
      void createVisitedCountry(DBUser user, DBCountry country)
      Creates a row in the table user_country which shows the countries where the user has been by adding the user id and the country name to the table.

      Deletes all travels which a user has created.

      Deletes a row from the travel table (a travel).

      Deletes the value of the stored wallpaper with the given information about the travel which has the wallpaper.

      Deletes a row from the table user_country, which shows the countries where the user has been, by comparing the user id and the country name with the rows in the table.

      • createVisitedCountry

        public void createVisitedCountry(DBUser user,
                        DBCountry country)
        Creates a row in the table user_country which shows the countries where the user has been by adding the user id and the country name to the table.
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        country - the country where the user has been

      • deleteVisitedCountry

        public void deleteVisitedCountry(DBUser user,
                        DBCountry country)
        Deletes a row from the table user_country, which shows the countries where the user has been, by comparing the user id and the country name with the rows in the table.
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        country - the country

      • deleteAllVisitedCountries

        public void deleteAllVisitedCountries(DBUser user)
        Deletes all the users visited countries, which is needed if the user is deleted from the database. The method finds the rows which contains the user id.
        Parameters:
        user - the relevant user

      • createUser

        public void createUser(DBUser user)
        Creates a user by adding information from an DBUser object to the database.
        Parameters:
        user -

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(DBUser user)
        Deletes a user by finding the row with the relevant user id. It is not enough to delete the user, therefore the associated travels and visited countries are deleted from the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the relevant user
        See Also:
        deleteAllTravels(DBUser), deleteAllVisitedCountries(DBUser)

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(DBUser user)
        Updates user information
        Parameters:
        user - the relevant user

      • updateTravel

        Updates travel information.
        Parameters:
        travel - the travel with the new information, but still contains the old travel id

      • getTravels

        public java.util.List<DBTravel> getTravels(DBUser user,
                                  android.content.Context context)
        Lists all the user's travels. If the user has not set an own wallpaper, this method gives the list object a default one.
        Parameters:
        user - the relevant user
        context - the activity contaxt
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        DBUser

      • setCountries

        public void setCountries()
        Creates DBCountry objects of all countries in the world and calls on the method createCountry(DBCountry) which stores the information in the database.

        DBCountry, createCountry(DBCountry)
